name: Hotkeys
description: Enhance your efficiency with the Hotkeys app! Customize and manage button shortcuts for all your favorite applications. Simplify tasks, save time, and streamline your workflow.
author: CodeGeek
descriptionMD:
## Overview
The Hotkeys program is a versatile and user-friendly tool that allows you to:

- Execute key combinations or commands with a single click.
- Access these shortcuts directly from your phone, making it convenient and efficient to manage tasks remotely.

## Customizable
- Adjust the **number of rows and columns** to suit your needs through the **Settings Screen**.
- Create layouts that perfectly match your workflow and device.
- Personalize each button with:
  - **Icons**: Add visual identifiers for easy recognition.
  - **Actions**: Assign specific key combinations or commands to each button.
- Tailor the interface to fit your preferences and make tasks quicker and easier to perform.

name: Passwords
description: A password manager that safely stores and auto-fills your login credentials.
author: CodeGeek
descriptionMD:
## Overview
The Password Manager is a secure and efficient tool designed to:

- Store all your passwords safely behind a single, secure **login password**.
- Automatically fill in your username or password with a single click, saving you time and effort.

## Features

### Secure Storage
- All your passwords are encrypted and stored securely.
- Access everything with a single, master **login password**, ensuring your data remains private and protected.
Warning: Your **login password** cannot be recovered. Ensure you remember it.

### One-Click Autofill
- Easily auto-fill your saved usernames and passwords on websites or apps.
- Streamline your login process and avoid the hassle of typing credentials repeatedly.

name: Translate
description: A fast translation app that lets you translate text with a single click.
author: CodeGeek
descriptionMD:
## Overview
The Translate Tool is a powerful and easy-to-use tool that quickly translates text into any language with just one click.

## How to Use

Follow these steps to utilize the Translate Tool effectively:

1. **Select Text**
- Highlight the text you want to translate using your mouse on your PC.

2. **Choose Language**
- On your ScreenDeck device, select the desired language from the wide range of supported options.

3. **Translate**
- Press the **Translate** button to view the translation directly on your ScreenDeck device.
- Click **Translate & Replace** to replace the selected text with the translated version instantly.

## Features
- **One-Click Translation**: Instantly translate text into any language with minimal effort.
- **Dual Functionality**: Choose between viewing translations or replacing text with translations.
- **Wide Language Support**: Translate text into numerous languages to meet diverse needs.

name: Weather
description: Get accurate, up-to-the-minute weather updates. Stay informed and prepared with the user-friendly interface.
author: CodeGeek
descriptionMD:
## Overview
The Weather App is a real-time weather viewer that:

- Displays current **temperature**, **wind speed**, **humidity**, and **precipitation**.
- Provides live updates to keep you informed about the latest weather conditions.
- Offers a customizable experience by allowing you to configure the location displayed in the **Settings Screen**.
